account.withdraw.close.strategy.warning: You can close an investment into your strategy only by closing the strategy itself. Please note that this action is irreversible.
account.withdraw.close.investment.warnin: You can close your investment at any moment. Later you will be able to create a new investment into the same strategy. Note that after closing the investment drawdown will become 0.

The current equity of your investment is calculated by indicative quotes. When your investment is closed, all open positions will be closed by current market quotes which can slightly differ from the indicative ones.

strategy.add.script.title: Ready!
strategy.add.script.message:
Your strategy has been created successfully.
To send signals from your MetaTrader 4 or MetaTrader 5 trading account, download the signal script and run it in your MetaTrader terminal.
You can also download it later by selecting the respective option in your strategy's context menu.
1. Before you launch the EA for the first time, please make sure that RAMM URL is in the list of allowed URLs in your MetaTrader.
For that, in menu Tools - Options - Expert Advisors add https://maindc.ramm.store/api/trading/v1/signals.send to table âAllow WebRequest for listed URL:â
2. Put the EA into any chart window.
Since now, all changes on your account will be copied to your strategy in RAMM.
strategy.add.script.download.title: Download signal script
strategy.details.message.pageForbidden: This page is not visible to other users.
strategy.details.message.closed: The trader has closed the strategy so it is no longer available for investing.
strategy.details.message.risk: Risk warning: the results of previous trading operations do not guarantee the same results in the future.
strategy.details.message.chart: The chart shows the yield of the strategy according to the trader's investment. The yield is calculated without Trader's fee deduction.
strategy.details.message.yieldMonthly: Monthly yield is an average yield (without Trader's fee deduction) based on the historical data and calculated since the strategy creation moment.
